page.title: 02Local News
page.content: Local News Local news is contained in the following newspapers. The Western Morning News, Mid Devon Advertiser, Western Times. There is also a local monthly magazine called The News In Moreton. Here are some extracts from the July 1985 edition. Warning and Arrest..... Moreton's Community Constable, Mark Phillips, has issued a warning to people not to leave handbags and valuables in unattended vehicles.PC Phillips' warning comes after the usual spate of summer thefts from cars parked near moorland beauty spots. Frost in June!!! A ground frost was recorded on Sat 8th June.It was the first time since the hot summer in 1976.
